title: Find Doctors and Dentists Near You

content: Pediatric hypertension is more common than you might think, yet it’s often undiagnosed. Learn why and what you can do to protect your child.

content_blocks.text: Pediatric hypertension is more common than you might think, yet it’s often undiagnosed. Learn why and what you can do to protect your child.

sections.heading: 1 of 5 / Toddler Milestones
content: Separation anxiety when a child becomes fearful and nervous when away from home or separated from a loved one.
Children and adolescents need at least 9 hours of sleep every night.
Many children between ages 1 and 3 go through a biting phase, which they eventually outgrow.
Temper tantrums can erupt months before your child's 2nd birthday, and they can be quite a spectacle.
bullets: 13 Months: Separation Anxiety Separation anxiety when a child becomes fearful and nervous when away from home or separated from a loved one.
Sleep and Naps Children and adolescents need at least 9 hours of sleep every night.
Biting Many children between ages 1 and 3 go through a biting phase, which they eventually outgrow.
Tantrums Temper tantrums can erupt months before your child's 2nd birthday, and they can be quite a spectacle.

Temper tantrums can erupt months before your child's 2nd birthday, and they can be quite a spectacle.

sections.heading: 2 of 5 / Child Development
content: This is the time when your little one's character starts to take shape and they blossom into their own person.
At around age 3, children’s imaginations and language skills seem to get supercharged.
Your 3- to 4-year-old child will continue to grow and develop in many ways in the coming year.
Your child is growing up. Have you noticed that your 4- to 5-year-old is becoming more independent and self-confident?

sections.heading: 3 of 5 / Behavior & Discipline
content: See how a behavior chart is a positive reinforcement tool to track and encourage desired behavior in children.
Anyone who has had a child, or been around one, has probably seen the dreaded temper tantrum.
Learn all about the benefits of a calm-down corner and how to make your own.
The teen years can bring some of the toughest discipline challenges parents have to face.

sections.heading: 4 of 5 / Child Safety
content: The following tips should help you keep your baby out of harm's way from birth through their toddler years.
Trampolines are fun, but they can also be dangerous. Learn all about trampoline safety for children.
Learn about ways to keep kids safe on bikes, including bike safety tips, common bike injuries, and more.
Proven step-by-step instructions for how to talk to your kids about social media.

sections.heading: 5 of 5 / Healthy Habits
content: If you believe the ads, every kid needs a daily Flintstones or gummy bear vitamin. But is it true?
It can be tough to motivate a kid to exercise when they just aren’t interested.

sections.heading: Suggested Reads about Health & Parenting
content: Kids learn their health habits by watching you. Find out how your food, exercise, and other choices rub off on them.
Does your family’s health take a backseat during special occasions? Find out the facts from WebMD about your favorite traditions and celebrations.
Do your kids do too much? Take this WebMD quiz to see if your kids are overscheduled and stressed out.
You can get good deals on some things, but secondhand  is not always the way to go. Find out when thrifting is fine and when buying new is a better idea.

meta_description: Here you'll find parenting tips and informative information including expert parenting advice for each age and stage in your child's development.
